LanguageData.Milira_CaravanTravelExplanation: Caravan speed up when only Milira included.
LanguageData.Milira_ExitFortressDesc: Exit Fortress mode immediately, remaining resources will be returned.
LanguageData.Milira_FortressCarrierDesc: Maximium of resources that's automatically placed in {0} is determined by this carrier.
LanguageData.Milira.LetterFallenAngelDesc: In a nearby place warped the Milira, grievously injured, her silver wings drooping limply in the front blemished with soil and gore, whereon the shivering feather rhythmizing along her feeble breath and the passing wind.
LanguageData.Milira.LetterFallenAngleJoinDesc: {0} returned back and appreciated our former benevolence, as well as expressing her willing to join us.\n”I…want to learn more of you.”
LanguageData.Milira.StoryDisabled_ConditionFailed_Des: The Sky Elves and the Skyfeathered Church shall coexist to start the storyline of Milira, and they are foes. Current world doesn’t match that condition, ergo tasks and events relating wont occur.
LanguageData.Milira.ResonateDesc: Choose one milian class and resonate it tuning to level I.
LanguageData.Milira.HairChangeDesc: To change the hair style of selected Milian.
